Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Skin-RF
Mod.Author: Dulca
Mod.Description: Skin-RF is a graphical upgrade for battle and field models for playable characters. You'll find a variety of costumes to use in and out of combat. You can customize your team to your liking even more with options for weapons. Note : Appart from Squall's field models, other characters field models are a Work In Progress (WIP). You'll need to activate them manually.
